pr_title: Avoid type coercion when a dereferenced field is same type

timeline.bodyText: The coercers list is expected to be the same size as columnMapping. I think that'll require an empty coercer to be added here.
timeline.author: phd3

timeline.bodyText: nit: something like //  Verify field access when the row evolves without changes to field type would be more descriptive.
timeline.author: phd3

timeline.message: Avoid type coercion when a dereferenced field is same type
